scripts.build:samples: npm run build:prod && gulp test:samples && gulp test:e2e:samples
scripts.publish: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --exact --force-publish -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --dist-tag=beta -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:next: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --dist-tag=next --skip-git -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:rc: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --dist-tag=rc -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --dist-tag=test --skip-git --force-publish -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
